amendment.description: Amendment provides for a ban on coordination of soft money for issue advocacy by presidential candidates receiving public financing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new title inserting a ban on coordinated soft money activities by presidential candidates.

action.text: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Whitfield to the Shays amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Whitfield amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
